Handles edge cases like invalid grades.\n */\npublic class ReportCard {\n    private Map<String, Double> grades;\n    \n    /**\n     * Default constructor - initializes an empty grade map\n     */\n    public ReportCard() {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor with initial grades\n     * \n     * @param grades Initial map of subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public ReportCard(Map<String, Double> grades) {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Add or update a grade for a subject\n     * Validates the grade is within valid range (0-100)\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @param grade The grade value (0-100)\n     * @return true if grade was successfully added/updated, false if grade is invalid\n     */\n    public boolean addOrUpdateGrade(String subject, double grade) {\n        if (!isValidGrade(grade)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        grades.put(subject, grade);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name to remove\n     * @return true if grade was removed, false if subject didn\'t exist\n     */\n    public boolean removeGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.remove(subject) != null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @return The grade value, or null if subject doesn\'t exist\n     */\n    public Double getGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.get(subject);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get all grades as an unmodifiable map\n     * \n     * @return Map of all subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public Map<String, Double> getAllGrades() {\n        return new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Calculate the average grade across all subjects\n     * Handles edge case when there are no grades\n     * \n     * @return The average grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double calculateAverage() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double sum = 0.0;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            sum += grade;\n        }\n        return sum / grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the highest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The highest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getHighestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double highest = Double.MIN_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade > highest) {\n                highest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return highest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the lowest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The lowest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getLowestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double lowest = Double.MAX_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade < lowest) {\n                lowest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return lowest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if a grade value is valid (between 0 and 100 inclusive)\n     * \n     * @param grade The grade to validate\n     * @return true if grade is valid, false otherwise\n     */\n    public static boolean isValidGrade(double grade) {\n        return grade >= 0.0 && grade <= 100.0;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if the report card has any grades\n     * \n     * @return true if there are grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean hasGrades() {\n        return !grades.isEmpty();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the number of subjects with grades\n     * \n     * @return Count of subjects\n     */\n    public int getSubjectCount() {\n        return grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Clear all grades from the report card\n     */\n    public void clearAllGrades() {\n        grades.clear();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * String representation of the ReportCard\n     * Shows all subjects and grades, plus average\n     * \n     * @return Formatted string with report card details\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return "Report Card: No grades available";\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        sb.append("Report Card:\\n");\n        for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n            sb.append(String.format("  %s: %.2f\\n", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));\n        }\n        sb.append(String.format("Average Grade: %.2f", calculateAverage()));\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if two report cards are equal\n     * Two report cards are equal if they have the same grades\n     * \n     * @param obj Object to compare with\n     * @return true if report cards have same grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean equals(Object obj) {\n        if (this == obj) return true;\n        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) return false;\n        ReportCard that = (ReportCard) obj;\n        return  private List<Student> students;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for Administrator class\n     * \n     * @param username Administrator username\n     * @param password Administrator password\n     */\n    public Administrator(String username, String password) {\n        this.username = username;\n        this.password = password;\n        this.isLoggedIn = false;\n        this.students = new ArrayList<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Attempt to log in with provided credentials\n     * \n     * @param inputUsername Username to check\n     * @param inputPassword Password to check\n     * password.equals(inputPassword)) {\n            isLoggedIn = true;\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Log out the administrator\n     */\n return false; // Student ID already exists\n            }\n        }\n        \n        students.add(student);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Find a student by their ID\n     * (student.getStudentId().equals(studentId)) {\n                return student;\n            }\n        }\n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Edit a student\'s report card by updating java.util.Map<String, Double> subjectGrades) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        Student student = findStudentById(studentId);\n        if (student == null) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        ReportCard reportCard = student.getReportCard();\n        boolean allGradesValid = true;\n        \n        // Validate all grades before making any changes\n        for (java.util.Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : subjectGrades.entrySet()) {\n            if (!ReportCard.isValidGrade(entry.getValue())) {\n                allGradesValid = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (!allGradesValid) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Update grades\n public List<Student> getAllStudents() {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        return new ArrayList<>(students);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a System displays form with fields to modify (including subject grades)\n * 2. User enters new data and clicks confirmation\n * 3. System displays confirmation message and shows the form with list of students\n */\npublic class EditOfOnePage {\n    private Administrator administrator;\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for EditOfOnePage\n     * \n     * @param administrator The administrator who will perform the edit operation\n     */\n    public EditOfOnePage(Administrator administrator) {\n        this.administrator = administrator;\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Main method to execute the EditOfOnePage use case\n     * This method executeEditUseCase() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Starting EditOfOnePage Use Case ===");\n        \n        // Precondition check: Administrator must be logged in\n        if (!administrator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Administrator must be logged in to perform this operation.");\n            System.out.println("Precondition failed: User is not logged in as administrator.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Precondition check: Administrator must have carried out \'DisplayedUnapagella\'\n        // and clicked the edit button (simulated by having students in the system)\n        if (administrator.getStudentCount() == 0) {\n            System.out.println("Error: No students available to edit.");\n            System.out.println("Precondition failed: Must have carried out \'DisplayedUnapagella\' first.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 1: Display the form with list of students (simulating DisplayedUnapagella)\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Displaying List of Students ---");\n        displayStudentsList();\n        \n        // Step 2: Get student ID to edit\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Select Student to Edit ---");\n        String studentId = promptForStudentId();\n        if (studentId == null) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 3: Display current report card for the selected student\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Current Report Card ---");\n        Student student = administrator.findStudentById(studentId);\n        if (student == null) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Student not found with ID: " + studentId);\n            return false;\n        }\n from user\n        Map<String, Double> newGrades = collectNewGrades(student.getReportCard());\n        \n        // Step 6: Confirm and apply changes\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Confirmation ---");\n        if (confirmChanges(student, newGrades)) {\n            // Apply the changes\n            boolean success = administrator.editStudentReportCard(studentId, newGrades);\n            \n            if (success) {\n                // Step 7: Display confirmation message\n                System.out.println("\\n✓✓✓ CONFIRMATION MESSAGE ✓✓✓");\n                System.out.println("The report card for student " + student.getName() + \n                                 " (ID: " + studentId + ") has been successfully updated!");\n                \n                // Step 8: Display the form with list of students again\n                System.out.println("\\n--- Step 8: Updated List of Students ---");\n                displayStudentsList();\n                \n                // Postcondition: Report has been modified\n                System.out.println("\\n✓ Postcondition satisfied: Report for student has been modified.");\n                \n                // Simulate user interrupting connection to SMOS server\n                System.out.println("(Simulation: User interrupts connection to SMOS server)");\n                \n                return true;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("Error: Failed to update report card. Please check if grades are valid (0-100).");\n                return false;\n            }\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Edit operation cancelled by user.");\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the list of all students in the system\n     * This simulates the \'DisplayedUnapagella\' functionality\n     */\n    private void displayStudentsList() {\n        System.out.println("List of Students:");\n        System.out.println("=================");\n        \n        java.util.List<Student> students = administrator.getAllStudents();\n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in the system.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.printf("%d. ID: %-10s Name: %-20s\\n", \n                            i + 1, student.getStudentId(), student.getName());\n        }\n        System.out.println("=================");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Prompt the user to enter a student ID for editing\n     * \n     * @return The student ID entered by user, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private String promptForStudentId() {\n        System.out.print("Enter the Student ID to edit (or \'cancel\' to abort): ");\n        String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n            System.out.println("Operation cancelled.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Validate student exists\n        Student student = administrator.findStudentById(input);\n        if (student == null) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Student with ID \'" + input + "\' not found.");\n            return promptForStudentId(); // Recursive retry\n        }\n        \n        return input;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the current report card for a student\n     * \n     * @param student The student whose report card to display\n     */\n    private void displayStudentReportCard(Student student) {\n        System.out.println("Student: " + student.getName() + " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        System.out.println(student.getReportCard().toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Collect new grades from the user\n     * \n     * @param currentReportCard The current report card to show existing grades\n     * @return Map of subject names to new grade values\n     */\n    private Map<String, Double> collectNewGrades(ReportCard currentReportCard) {\n        Map<String, Double> newGrades = new HashMap<>();\n        Map<String, Double> currentGrades = currentReportCard.getAllGrades();\n        \n        if (currentGrades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No existing grades found. You can add new subjects.");\n            System.out.println("Format: <subject_name> <grade> (grade must be 0-100)");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Current grades:");\n            for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : currentGrades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.printf("  %s: %.2f\\n", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());\n            }\n            System.out.println("Enter subject name and new grade, or just subject name to remove.");\n        }\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("\\nEnter subject and grade (or \'done\' to finish): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("done")) {\n                break;\n            }\n            \n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a subject name and grade.");\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // Parse input\n            String[] parts = input.split("\\\\s+", 2);\n            String subject = parts[0].trim();\n            \n            if (parts.length == 1) {\n                // User wants to remove this subject\n                System.out.println("Subject \'" + subject + "\' will be removed.");\n                newGrades.put(subject, null); // Using null to indicate removal\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            try {\n                double grade = Double.parseDouble(parts[1].trim());\n                \n                // Validate grade range\n                if (!ReportCard.isValidGrade(grade)) {\n                    System.out.println("Error: Grade must be between 0 and 100. Please try again.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                \n                newGrades.put(subject, grade);\n                System.out.println("Added: " + subject + " = " + grade);\n                \n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Error: Invalid grade format. Please enter a number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return newGrades;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the proposed changes and ask for confirmation\n     * \n     * @param student The student being edited\n     * @param newGrades The new grades to apply\n     * @return true if user confirms, false if user cancels\n     */\n    private boolean confirmChanges(Student student, Map<String, Double> newGrades) {\n        if (newGrades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No changes to apply.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("\\nProposed changes for student: " + student.getName());\n        System.out.println("==========================================");\n        \n        Map<String, Double> currentGrades = student.getReportCard().getAllGrades();\n        \n        for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : newGrades.entrySet()) {\n            String subject = entry.getKey();\n            Double newGrade = entry.getValue();\n            Double currentGrade = currentGrades.get(subject);\n            \n            if (newGrade == null) {\n                System.out.printf("  REMOVE: %s (current: %.2f)\\n", subject, \n                                currentGrade != null ? currentGrade : 0.0);\n            } else if (currentGrade == null) {\n                System.out.printf("  ADD: %s = %.2f (new)\\n", subject, newGrade);\n            } else {\n                System.out.printf("  UPDATE: %s: %.2f → %.2f\\n", \n                                subject, currentGrade, newGrade);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("==========================================");\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Confirm changes? (yes/no): ");\n            String response = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (response.equals("yes") || response.equals("y")) {\n                return true;\n            } else if (response.equals("no") || response.equals("n")) {\n                return false;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("Please enter \'yes\' or \'no\'.");\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Close the scanner resource\n     * Should be called when done with the EditOfOnePage instance\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the administrator associated with this EditOfOnePage instance\n     * \n     * @return The administrator object\n     */\n    public Administrator getAdministrator() {\n        return administrator;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * String representation of EditOfOnePage\n     * \n     * @return String describing the EditOfOnePage instance\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "EditOfOnePage [Administrator: " + administrator.getUsername() + \n               ", Logged in: " + administrator.isLoggedIn() + "]";\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. Handles edge cases like invalid grades.\n */\npublic class ReportCard {\n    private Map<String, Double> grades;\n    \n    /**\n     * Default constructor - initializes an empty grade map\n     */\n    public ReportCard() {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor with initial grades\n     * \n     * @param grades Initial map of subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public ReportCard(Map<String, Double> grades) {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Add or update a grade for a subject\n     * Validates the grade is within valid range (0-100)\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @param grade The grade value (0-100)\n     * @return true if grade was successfully added/updated, false if grade is invalid\n     */\n    public boolean addOrUpdateGrade(String subject, double grade) {\n        if (!isValidGrade(grade)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        grades.put(subject, grade);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name to remove\n     * @return true if grade was removed, false if subject didn\'t exist\n     */\n    public boolean removeGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.remove(subject) != null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @return The grade value, or null if subject doesn\'t exist\n     */\n    public Double getGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.get(subject);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get all grades as an unmodifiable map\n     * \n     * @return Map of all subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public Map<String, Double> getAllGrades() {\n        return new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Calculate the average grade across all subjects\n     * Handles edge case when there are no grades\n     * \n     * @return The average grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double calculateAverage() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double sum = 0.0;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            sum += grade;\n        }\n        return sum / grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the highest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The highest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getHighestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double highest = Double.MIN_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade > highest) {\n                highest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return highest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the lowest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The lowest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getLowestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double lowest = Double.MAX_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade < lowest) {\n                lowest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return lowest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if a grade value is valid (between 0 and 100 inclusive)\n     * \n     * @param grade The grade to validate\n     * @return true if grade is valid, false otherwise\n     */\n    public static boolean isValidGrade(double grade) {\n        return grade >= 0.0 && grade <= 100.0;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if the report card has any grades\n     * \n     * @return true if there are grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean hasGrades() {\n        return !grades.isEmpty();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the number of subjects with grades\n     * \n     * @return Count of subjects\n     */\n    public int getSubjectCount() {\n        return grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Clear all grades from the report card\n     */\n    public void clearAllGrades() {\n        grades.clear();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * String representation of the ReportCard\n     * Shows all subjects and grades, plus average\n     * \n     * @return Formatted string with report card details\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return "Report Card: No grades available";\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        sb.append("Report Card:\\n");\n        for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n            sb.append(String.format("  %s: %.2f\\n", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));\n        }\n        sb.append(String.format("Average Grade: %.2f", calculateAverage()));\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if two report cards are equal\n     * Two report cards are equal if they have the same grades\n     * \n     * @param obj Object to compare with\n     * @return true if report cards have same grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean equals(Object obj) {\n        if (this == obj) return true;\n        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) return false;\n        ReportCard that = (ReportCard) obj;\n        return Objects.equals(grades, that.grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Generate hash code based on grades map\n     * \n     * @return Hash code for the report card\n     */\n    @Override\n    public int hashCode() {\n        return Objects.hash(grades);\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished.  private List<Student> students;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for Administrator class\n     * \n     * @param username Administrator username\n     * @param password Administrator password\n     */\n    public Administrator(String username, String password) {\n        this.username = username;\n        this.password = password;\n        this.isLoggedIn = false;\n        this.students = new password.equals(inputPassword)) {\n            isLoggedIn = true;\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Log out the administrator\n     */\n  public boolean isLoggedIn() {\n        return isLoggedIn;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Add a student to the system\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param student false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check if student already exists\n        for (Student s : students) {\n            if (s.getStudentId().equals(student.getStudentId())) {\n                return false; // Student ID already exists\n            }\n        }\n        \n        students.add(student);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Find a student by their ID\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param studentId ID of the student to find\n     * @return Student object if found, null if not found or not logged in\n     */\n    public Student findStudentById(String studentId) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        for (Student student : students) {\n            if (student.getStudentId().equals(studentId)) {\n                return student;\n            }\n        }\n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Edit a student\'s report card by updating == null) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        ReportCard reportCard = student.getReportCard();\n        boolean allGradesValid = true;\n        \n        // Validate all grades before making any changes\n        for (java.util.Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : subjectGrades.entrySet()) {\n            if (!ReportCard.isValidGrade(entry.getValue())) {\n                allGradesValid = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (!allGradesValid) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Update grades\n        for (java.util.Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : subjectGrades.entrySet()) {\n            reportCard.addOrUpdateGrade(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n public List<Student> getAllStudents() {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        return new ArrayList<>(students);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a System displays form with fields to modify (including subject grades)\n * 2. User enters new data and clicks confirmation\n * 3. System displays confirmation message and shows the form with list of students\n */\npublic class EditOfOnePage {\n    private Administrator administrator;\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for EditOfOnePage\n     * \n     * @param administrator The administrator who will perform the edit operation\n     */\n    public EditOfOnePage(Administrator administrator) {\n        this.administrator = administrator;\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Main method to execute the EditOfOnePage use case\n     * This method orchestrates the complete workflow for editing a student\'s report card\n     * \n     * @return true if the use case completed successfully, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean executeEditUseCase() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Starting EditOfOnePage Use Case ===");\n        \n        // Precondition check: Administrator must be logged in\n        if (!administrator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Administrator must be logged in to perform this operation.");\n            System.out.println("Precondition failed: User is not logged in as administrator.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Precondition check: Administrator must have carried out \'DisplayedUnapagella\'\n        // and clicked the edit button (simulated by having students in the system)\n        if (administrator.getStudentCount() == 0) {\n            System.out.println("Error: No students available to edit.");\n            System.out.println("Precondition failed: Must have carried out \'DisplayedUnapagella\' first.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 1: Display the form with list of students (simulating DisplayedUnapagella)\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Displaying List of Students ---");\n        displayStudentsList();\n        \n        // Step 2: Get student ID to edit\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Select Student to Edit ---");\n        String studentId = promptForStudentId();\n        if (studentId == null) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 3: Display current report card for the selected student\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Current Report Card ---");\n        Student student = administrator.findStudentById(studentId);\n        if (student == null) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Student not found with ID: " + studentId);\n            return false;\n        }\n        displayStudentReportCard(student);\n        \n        // Step 4: Display form with fields to modify\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Edit Form ---");\n        System.out.println("Enter new grades for the student (leave blank to keep current value).");\n        System.out.println("Enter \'done\' when finished entering grades.");\n        \n        // Step 5: Collect new grade data from user\n        Map<String, Double> newGrades = collectNewGrades(student.getReportCard());\n        \n        // Step 6: Confirm and apply changes\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Confirmation ---");\n        if (confirmChanges(student, newGrades)) {\n            // Apply the changes\n            boolean success = administrator.editStudentReportCard(studentId, newGrades);\n            \n            if (success) {\n                // Step 7: Display confirmation message\n                System.out.println("\\n✓✓✓ CONFIRMATION MESSAGE ✓✓✓");\n                System.out.println("The report card for student " + student.getName() + \n                                 " (ID: " + studentId + ") has been successfully updated!");\n                \n                // Step 8: Display the form with list of students again\n                System.out.println("\\n--- Step 8: Updated List of Students ---");\n                displayStudentsList();\n                \n                // Postcondition: Report has been modified\n                System.out.println("\\n✓ Postcondition satisfied: Report for student has been modified.");\n                \n                // Simulate user interrupting connection to SMOS server\n                System.out.println("(Simulation: User interrupts connection to SMOS server)");\n                \n                return true;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("Error: Failed to update report card. Please check if grades are valid (0-100).");\n                return false;\n            }\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Edit operation cancelled by user.");\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the list of all students in the system\n     * This simulates the \'DisplayedUnapagella\' functionality\n     */\n    private void displayStudentsList() {\n        System.out.println("List of Students:");\n        System.out.println("=================");\n        \n        java.util.List<Student> students = administrator.getAllStudents();\n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in the system.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.printf("%d. ID: %-10s Name: %-20s\\n", \n                            i + 1, student.getStudentId(), student.getName());\n        }\n        System.out.println("=================");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Prompt the user to enter a student ID for editing\n     * \n     * @return The student ID entered by user, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private String promptForStudentId() {\n        System.out.print("Enter the Student ID to edit (or \'cancel\' to abort): ");\n        String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n            System.out.println("Operation cancelled.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Validate student exists\n        Student student = administrator.findStudentById(input);\n        if (student == null) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Student with ID \'" + input + "\' not found.");\n            return promptForStudentId(); // Recursive retry\n        }\n        \n        return input;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the current report card for a student\n     * \n     * @param student The student whose report card to display\n     */\n    private void displayStudentReportCard(Student student) {\n        System.out.println("Student: " + student.getName() + " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        System.out.println(student.getReportCard().toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Collect new grades from the user\n     * \n     * @param currentReportCard The current report card to show existing grades\n     * @return Map of subject names to new grade values\n     */\n    private Map<String, Double> collectNewGrades(ReportCard currentReportCard) {\n        Map<String, Double> newGrades = new HashMap<>();\n        Map<String, Double> currentGrades = currentReportCard.getAllGrades();\n        \n        if (currentGrades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No existing grades found. You can add new subjects.");\n            System.out.println("Format: <subject_name> <grade> (grade must be 0-100)");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Current grades:");\n            for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : currentGrades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.printf("  %s: %.2f\\n", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());\n            }\n            System.out.println("Enter subject name and new grade, or just subject name to remove.");\n        }\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("\\nEnter subject and grade (or \'done\' to finish): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("done")) {\n                break;\n            }\n            \n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a subject name and grade.");\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // Parse input\n            String[] parts = input.split("\\\\s+", 2);\n            String subject = parts[0].trim();\n            \n            if (parts.length == 1) {\n                // User wants to remove this subject\n                System.out.println("Subject \'" + subject + "\' will be removed.");\n                newGrades.put(subject, null); // Using null to indicate removal\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            try {\n                double grade = Double.parseDouble(parts[1].trim());\n                \n                // Validate grade range\n                if (!ReportCard.isValidGrade(grade)) {\n                    System.out.println("Error: Grade must be between 0 and 100. Please try again.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                \n                newGrades.put(subject, grade);\n                System.out.println("Added: " + subject + " = " + grade);\n                \n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Error: Invalid grade format. Please enter a number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return newGrades;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the proposed changes and ask for confirmation\n     * \n     * @param student The student being edited\n     * @param newGrades The new grades to apply\n     * @return true if user confirms, false if user cancels\n     */\n    private boolean confirmChanges(Student student, Map<String, Double> newGrades) {\n        if (newGrades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No changes to apply.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("\\nProposed changes for student: " + student.getName());\n        System.out.println("==========================================");\n        \n        Map<String, Double> currentGrades = student.getReportCard().getAllGrades();\n        \n        for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : newGrades.entrySet()) {\n            String subject = entry.getKey();\n            Double newGrade = entry.getValue();\n            Double currentGrade = currentGrades.get(subject);\n            \n            if (newGrade == null) {\n                System.out.printf("  REMOVE: %s (current: %.2f)\\n", subject, \n                                currentGrade != null ? currentGrade : 0.0);\n            } else if (currentGrade == null) {\n                System.out.printf("  ADD: %s = %.2f (new)\\n", subject, newGrade);\n            } else {\n                System.out.printf("  UPDATE: %s: %.2f → %.2f\\n", \n                                subject, currentGrade, newGrade);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("==========================================");\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Confirm changes? (yes/no): ");\n            String response = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (response.equals("yes") || response.equals("y")) {\n                return true;\n            } else if (response.equals("no") || response.equals("n")) {\n                return false;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("Please enter \'yes\' or \'no\'.");\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Close the scanner resource\n     * Should be called when done with the EditOfOnePage instance\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the administrator associated with this EditOfOnePage instance\n     * \n     * @return The administrator object\n     */\n    public Administrator getAdministrator() {\n        return administrator;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * String representation of EditOfOnePage\n     * \n     * @return String describing the EditOfOnePage instance\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "EditOfOnePage [Administrator: " + administrator.getUsername() + \n               ", Logged in: " + administrator.isLoggedIn() + "]";\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. Handles edge cases like invalid grades.\n */\npublic class ReportCard {\n    private Map<String, Double> grades;\n    \n    /**\n     * Default constructor - initializes an empty grade map\n     */\n    public ReportCard() {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor with initial grades\n     * \n     * @param grades Initial map of subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public ReportCard(Map<String, Double> grades) {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Add or update a grade for a subject\n     * Validates the grade is within valid range (0-100)\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @param grade The grade value (0-100)\n     * @return true if grade was successfully added/updated, false if grade is invalid\n     */\n    public boolean addOrUpdateGrade(String subject, double grade) {\n        if (!isValidGrade(grade)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        grades.put(subject, grade);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name to remove\n     * @return true if grade was removed, false if subject didn\'t exist\n     */\n    public boolean removeGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.remove(subject) != null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @return The grade value, or null if subject doesn\'t exist\n     */\n    public Double getGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.get(subject);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get all grades as an unmodifiable map\n     * \n     * @return Map of all subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public Map<String, Double> getAllGrades() {\n        return new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Calculate the average grade across all subjects\n     * Handles edge case when there are no grades\n     * \n     * @return The average grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double calculateAverage() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double sum = 0.0;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            sum += grade;\n        }\n        return sum / grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the highest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The highest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getHighestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double highest = Double.MIN_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade > highest) {\n                highest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return highest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the lowest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The lowest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getLowestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double lowest = Double.MAX_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade < lowest) {\n                lowest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return lowest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if a grade value is valid (between 0 and 100 inclusive)\n     * \n     * @param grade The grade to validate\n     * @return true if grade is valid, false otherwise\n     */\n    public static boolean isValidGrade(double grade) {\n        return grade >= 0.0 && grade <= 100.0;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if the report card has any grades\n     * \n     * @return true if there are grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean hasGrades() {\n        return !grades.isEmpty();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the number of subjects with grades\n     * \n     * @return Count of subjects\n     */\n    public int getSubjectCount() {\n        return grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Clear all grades from the report card\n     */\n    public void clearAllGrades() {\n        grades.clear();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * String representation of the ReportCard\n     * Shows all subjects and grades, plus average\n     * \n     * @return Formatted string with report card details\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return "Report Card: No grades available";\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        sb.append("Report Card:\\n");\n        for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n            sb.append(String.format("  %s: %.2f\\n", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));\n        }\n        sb.append(String.format("Average Grade: %.2f", calculateAverage()));\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if two report cards are equal\n     * Two report cards are equal if they have the same grades\n     * \n     * @param obj Object to compare with\n     * @return true if report cards have same grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean equals(Object obj) {\n        if (this == obj) return true;\n        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) return false;\n        ReportCard that = (ReportCard) obj;\n        return Objects.equals(grades, that.grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Generate hash code based on grades map\n     * \n     * @return Hash code for the report card\n     */\n    @Override\n    public int  private List<Student> students;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for Administrator class\n     * \n     * @param username Administrator username\n     * @param password Administrator password\n     */\n    public Administrator(String username, String password) {\n        this.username = username;\n        this.password = password;\n        this.isLoggedIn = false;\n        this.students = new ArrayList<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Attempt to log in with provided credentials\n     * \n     * @param inputUsername Username to check\n     * @param inputPassword Password to check\n     * password.equals(inputPassword)) {\n            isLoggedIn = true;\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Log out the administrator\n     */\n  public boolean isLoggedIn() {\n        return isLoggedIn;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Add a student to the system\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param student false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check if student already exists\n        for (Student s : students) {\n            if (s.getStudentId().equals(student.getStudentId())) {\n                return false; // Student ID already exists\n            }\n        }\n        \n        students.add(student);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Find a student by their ID\n     * Student findStudentById(String studentId) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        for (Student student : students) {\n            if (student.getStudentId().equals(studentId)) {\n                return student;\n            }\n        }\n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Edit a student\'s report card by updating == null) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        ReportCard reportCard = student.getReportCard();\n        boolean allGradesValid = true;\n        \n        // Validate all grades before making any changes\n        for (java.util.Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : subjectGrades.entrySet()) {\n            if (!ReportCard.isValidGrade(entry.getValue())) {\n                allGradesValid = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (!allGradesValid) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Update grades\n        for (java.util.Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : subjectGrades.entrySet()) {\n            reportCard.addOrUpdateGrade(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get all students in the system\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @return List of all students, or empty list if not logged in\n     */\n    public List<Student> getAllStudents() {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        return new ArrayList<>(students);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a student from the system\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param studentId ID of the student to remove\n     * @return true if student removed successfully, false if null;\n        for (Student student : students) {\n            if (student.getStudentId().equals(studentId)) {\n                studentToRemove = student;\n                break;\n            }\n System displays form with fields to modify (including subject grades)\n * 2. User enters new data and clicks confirmation\n * 3. System displays confirmation message and shows the form with list of students\n */\npublic class EditOfOnePage {\n    private Administrator administrator;\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for EditOfOnePage\n     * \n     * @param administrator The administrator who will perform the edit operation\n     */\n    public EditOfOnePage(Administrator administrator) {\n        this.administrator = administrator;\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Main method to execute the EditOfOnePage use case\n     * This method orchestrates the complete workflow for editing a student\'s report card\n     * \n     * @return true if the use case completed successfully, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean executeEditUseCase() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Starting EditOfOnePage Use Case ===");\n        \n        // Precondition check: Administrator must be logged in\n        if (!administrator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Administrator must be logged in to perform this operation.");\n            System.out.println("Precondition failed: User is not logged in as administrator.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Precondition check: Administrator must have carried out \'DisplayedUnapagella\'\n        // and clicked the edit button (simulated by having students in the system)\n        if (administrator.getStudentCount() == 0) {\n            System.out.println("Error: No students available to edit.");\n            System.out.println("Precondition failed: Must have carried out \'DisplayedUnapagella\' first.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 1: Display the form with list of }\n        \n        // Step 3: Display current report card for the selected student\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Current Report Card ---");\n        Student student = administrator.findStudentById(studentId);\n        if (student == null) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Student not found with ID: " + studentId);\n            return false;\n        }\n        displayStudentReportCard(student);\n        \n        // Step 4: Display form with fields to modify\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Edit Form ---");\n        System.out.println("Enter new grades for the student (leave blank to keep current value).");\n        System.out.println("Enter \'done\' when finished entering grades.");\n        \n        // Step 5: Collect new grade data from user\n        Map<String, Double> newGrades = collectNewGrades(student.getReportCard());\n        \n        // Step 6: Confirm and apply changes\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Confirmation ---");\n        if (confirmChanges(student, newGrades)) {\n            // Apply the changes\n            boolean success = administrator.editStudentReportCard(studentId, newGrades);\n            \n            if (success) {\n                // Step 7: Display confirmation message\n                System.out.println("\\n✓✓✓ CONFIRMATION MESSAGE ✓✓✓");\n                System.out.println("The report card for student " + student.getName() + \n                                 " (ID: " + studentId + ") has been successfully updated!");\n                \n                // Step 8: Display the form with list of students again\n                System.out.println("\\n--- Step 8: Updated List of Students ---");\n                displayStudentsList();\n                \n                // Postcondition: Report has been modified\n                System.out.println("\\n✓ Postcondition satisfied: Report for student has been modified.");\n                \n                // Simulate user interrupting connection to SMOS server\n                System.out.println("(Simulation: User interrupts connection to SMOS server)");\n                \n                return true;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("Error: Failed to update report card. Please check if grades are valid (0-100).");\n                return false;\n            }\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Edit operation cancelled by user.");\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the list of all students in the system\n     * This simulates the \'DisplayedUnapagella\' functionality\n     */\n    private void displayStudentsList() {\n        System.out.println("List of Students:");\n        System.out.println("=================");\n        \n        java.util.List<Student> students = administrator.getAllStudents();\n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in the system.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.printf("%d. ID: %-10s Name: %-20s\\n", \n                            i + 1, student.getStudentId(), student.getName());\n        }\n        System.out.println("=================");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Prompt the user to enter a student ID for editing\n     * \n     * @return The student ID entered by user, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private String promptForStudentId() {\n        System.out.print("Enter the Student ID to edit (or \'cancel\' to abort): ");\n        String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("cancel")) {\n            System.out.println("Operation cancelled.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Validate student exists\n        Student student = administrator.findStudentById(input);\n        if (student == null) {\n            System.out.println("Error: Student with ID \'" + input + "\' not found.");\n            return promptForStudentId(); // Recursive retry\n        }\n        \n        return input;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the current report card for a student\n     * \n     * @param student The student whose report card to display\n     */\n    private void displayStudentReportCard(Student student) {\n        System.out.println("Student: " + student.getName() + " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        System.out.println(student.getReportCard().toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Collect new grades from the user\n     * \n     * @param currentReportCard The current report card to show existing grades\n     * @return Map of subject names to new grade values\n     */\n    private Map<String, Double> collectNewGrades(ReportCard currentReportCard) {\n        Map<String, Double> newGrades = new HashMap<>();\n        Map<String, Double> currentGrades = currentReportCard.getAllGrades();\n        \n        if (currentGrades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No existing grades found. You can add new subjects.");\n            System.out.println("Format: <subject_name> <grade> (grade must be 0-100)");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Current grades:");\n            for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : currentGrades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.printf("  %s: %.2f\\n", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());\n            }\n            System.out.println("Enter subject name and new grade, or just subject name to remove.");\n        }\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("\\nEnter subject and grade (or \'done\' to finish): ");\n            String input = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("done")) {\n                break;\n            }\n            \n            if (input.isEmpty()) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a subject name and grade.");\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // Parse input\n            String[] parts = input.split("\\\\s+", 2);\n            String subject = parts[0].trim();\n            \n            if (parts.length == 1) {\n                // User wants to remove this subject\n                System.out.println("Subject \'" + subject + "\' will be removed.");\n                newGrades.put(subject, null); // Using null to indicate removal\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            try {\n                double grade = Double.parseDouble(parts[1].trim());\n                \n                // Validate grade range\n                if (!ReportCard.isValidGrade(grade)) {\n                    System.out.println("Error: Grade must be between 0 and 100. Please try again.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                \n                newGrades.put(subject, grade);\n                System.out.println("Added: " + subject + " = " + grade);\n                \n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Error: Invalid grade format. Please enter a number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return newGrades;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Display the proposed changes and ask for confirmation\n     * \n     * @param student The student being edited\n     * @param newGrades The new grades to apply\n     * @return true if user confirms, false if user cancels\n     */\n    private boolean confirmChanges(Student student, Map<String, Double> newGrades) {\n        if (newGrades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No changes to apply.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("\\nProposed changes for student: " + student.getName());\n        System.out.println("==========================================");\n        \n        Map<String, Double> currentGrades = student.getReportCard().getAllGrades();\n        \n        for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : newGrades.entrySet()) {\n            String subject = entry.getKey();\n            Double newGrade = entry.getValue();\n            Double currentGrade = currentGrades.get(subject);\n            \n            if (newGrade == null) {\n                System.out.printf("  REMOVE: %s (current: %.2f)\\n", subject, \n                                currentGrade != null ? currentGrade : 0.0);\n            } else if (currentGrade == null) {\n                System.out.printf("  ADD: %s = %.2f (new)\\n", subject, newGrade);\n            } else {\n                System.out.printf("  UPDATE: %s: %.2f → %.2f\\n", \n                                subject, currentGrade, newGrade);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("==========================================");\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Confirm changes? (yes/no): ");\n            String response = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n            \n            if (response.equals("yes") || response.equals("y")) {\n                return true;\n            } else if (response.equals("no") || response.equals("n")) {\n                return false;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("Please enter \'yes\' or \'no\'.");\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Close the scanner resource\n     * Should be called when done with the EditOfOnePage instance\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the administrator associated with this EditOfOnePage instance\n     * \n     * @return The administrator object\n     */\n    public Administrator getAdministrator() {\n        return administrator;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * String representation of EditOfOnePage\n     * \n     * @return String describing the EditOfOnePage instance\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "EditOfOnePage [Administrator: " + administrator.getUsername() + \n               ", Logged in: " + administrator.isLoggedIn() + "]";\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. Handles edge cases like invalid grades.\n */\npublic class ReportCard {\n    private Map<String, Double> grades;\n    \n    /**\n     * Default constructor - initializes an empty grade map\n     */\n    public ReportCard() {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor with initial grades\n     * \n     * @param grades Initial map of subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public ReportCard(Map<String, Double> grades) {\n        this.grades = new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Add or update a grade for a subject\n     * Validates the grade is within valid range (0-100)\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @param grade The grade value (0-100)\n     * @return true if grade was successfully added/updated, false if grade is invalid\n     */\n    public boolean addOrUpdateGrade(String subject, double grade) {\n        if (!isValidGrade(grade)) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        grades.put(subject, grade);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name to remove\n     * @return true if grade was removed, false if subject didn\'t exist\n     */\n    public boolean removeGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.remove(subject) != null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get grade for a specific subject\n     * \n     * @param subject The subject name\n     * @return The grade value, or null if subject doesn\'t exist\n     */\n    public Double getGrade(String subject) {\n        return grades.get(subject);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get all grades as an unmodifiable map\n     * \n     * @return Map of all subject-grade pairs\n     */\n    public Map<String, Double> getAllGrades() {\n        return new HashMap<>(grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Calculate the average grade across all subjects\n     * Handles edge case when there are no grades\n     * \n     * @return The average grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double calculateAverage() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double sum = 0.0;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            sum += grade;\n        }\n        return sum / grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the highest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The highest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getHighestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double highest = Double.MIN_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade > highest) {\n                highest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return highest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the lowest grade among all subjects\n     * \n     * @return The lowest grade, or 0.0 if no grades exist\n     */\n    public double getLowestGrade() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return 0.0;\n        }\n        \n        double lowest = Double.MAX_VALUE;\n        for (double grade : grades.values()) {\n            if (grade < lowest) {\n                lowest = grade;\n            }\n        }\n        return lowest;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if a grade value is valid (between 0 and 100 inclusive)\n     * \n     * @param grade The grade to validate\n     * @return true if grade is valid, false otherwise\n     */\n    public static boolean isValidGrade(double grade) {\n        return grade >= 0.0 && grade <= 100.0;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if the report card has any grades\n     * \n     * @return true if there are grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean hasGrades() {\n        return !grades.isEmpty();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the number of subjects with grades\n     * \n     * @return Count of subjects\n     */\n    public int getSubjectCount() {\n        return grades.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Clear all grades from the report card\n     */\n    public void clearAllGrades() {\n        grades.clear();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * String representation of the ReportCard\n     * Shows all subjects and grades, plus average\n     * \n     * @return Formatted string with report card details\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            return "Report Card: No grades available";\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        sb.append("Report Card:\\n");\n        for (Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n            sb.append(String.format("  %s: %.2f\\n", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));\n        }\n        sb.append(String.format("Average Grade: %.2f", calculateAverage()));\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if two report cards are equal\n     * Two report cards are equal if they have the same grades\n     * \n     * @param obj Object to compare with\n     * @return true if report cards have same grades, false otherwise\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean equals(Object obj) {\n        if (this == obj) return true;\n        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) return false;\n        ReportCard that = (ReportCard) obj;\n        return Objects.equals(grades, that.grades);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Generate hash code based on grades map\n     * \n     * @return Hash code for the report card\n     */\n    @Override\n    public int hashCode() {\n        return Objects.hash(grades);\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished.  private List<Student> students;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for Administrator class\n     * \n     * @param username Administrator username\n     * @param password Administrator password\n     */\n    public Administrator(String username, String password) {\n        this.username = username;\n        this.password = password;\n        this.isLoggedIn = false;\n        this.students = new ArrayList<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Attempt to log in with provided credentials\n     * \n     * @param inputUsername Username to check\n     * @param inputPassword Password to check\n     * @return true if login successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean login(String inputUsername, String inputPassword) {\n        if (username.equals(inputUsername) && password.equals(inputPassword)) {\n            isLoggedIn = true;\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Log out the administrator\n     */\n    public void logout() {\n        isLoggedIn = false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Check if administrator is currently logged in\n     * \n     * @return true if logged in, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean isLoggedIn() {\n        return isLoggedIn;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Add a student to the system\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param student Student to add\n     * @return true if student added successfully, false if not logged in\n     */\n    public boolean addStudent(Student student) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check if student already exists\n        for (Student s : students) {\n            if (s.getStudentId().equals(student.getStudentId())) {\n                return false; // Student ID already exists\n            }\n        }\n        \n        students.add(student);\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Find a student by their ID\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param studentId ID of the student to find\n     * @return Student object if found, null if not found or not logged in\n     */\n    public Student findStudentById(String studentId) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        for (Student student : students) {\n            if (student.getStudentId().equals(studentId)) {\n                return student;\n            }\n        }\n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Edit a student\'s report card by updating grades for specific subjects\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param studentId ID of the student whose report card to edit\n     * @param subjectGrades Map of subject names and new grades\n     * @return true if edit successful, false if student not found, not logged in, or invalid grades\n     */\n    public boolean editStudentReportCard(String studentId, java.util.Map<String, Double> subjectGrades) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        Student student = findStudentById(studentId);\n        if (student == null) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        ReportCard reportCard = student.getReportCard();\n        boolean allGradesValid = true;\n        \n        // Validate all grades before making any changes\n        for (java.util.Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : subjectGrades.entrySet()) {\n            if (!ReportCard.isValidGrade(entry.getValue())) {\n                allGradesValid = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (!allGradesValid) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Update grades\n        for (java.util.Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : subjectGrades.entrySet()) {\n            reportCard.addOrUpdateGrade(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get all students in the system\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @return List of all students, or empty list if not logged in\n     */\n    public List<Student> getAllStudents() {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        return new ArrayList<>(students);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Remove a student from the system\n     * Only allowed if administrator is logged in\n     * \n     * @param studentId ID of the student to remove\n     * @return true if student removed successfully, false if not found or not logged in\n     */\n    public boolean removeStudent(String studentId) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        Student studentToRemove = null;\n        for (Student student : students) {\n            if (student.getStudentId().equals(studentId)) {\n                studentToRemove = student;\n                break;\n            }\n
